A key theme is the increasing importance of technology companies in the Vietnamese market, moving beyond a reliance on banking and real estate stocks.  Analysts suggest that long-term growth remains strong for the sector due to AI, semiconductor, and cloud computing trends.  However, short-term pressure exists from rapid gains and potential profit-taking. The need for Vietnamese companies to develop stronger domestic capabilities in semiconductor manufacturing and chip design is also highlighted.

title: FPT bắt tay trường đại học Top đầu Singapore, muốn kêu gọi 50 triệu USD để nghiên cứu và phát triển tài năng AI
summary: FPT and Singapore's National University of Singapore (NUS) are partnering to establish an AI research facility and fund AI talent development.  The collaboration aims to attract US$50 million in funding over five years to advance AI research and training programs.  The facility will leverage NUS' research strengths and FPT's technological capabilities to develop AI solutions for various sectors like finance, insurance, and logistics.  This initiative also reflects FPT's broader strategy to develop a strong AI workforce and compete in the global AI market.

title: FPT phát triển thành công bộ sạc 65W với chip tự sản xuất, người dùng đánh giá "ngang ngửa các thương hiệu khác"
summary: FPT Semiconductor has released a 65W charger with its own chip, available for purchase.  The charger's design is similar to other chargers on the market, featuring a white casing with two USB-C ports and one USB-A port.  A key feature is the prominently displayed "FPT Chip Inside" branding.  Initial user feedback suggests the charger has good build quality, fast charging speed, and doesn't overheat, comparing favorably to other popular brands.  However, the charger is not yet widely available, and its long-term performance remains to be seen.

title: FPT và SCSK sẽ thành lập liên doanh thúc đẩy chuyển đổi số tại Nhật Bản
summary: FPT and SCSK, a Japanese tech firm, are partnering to form COBOL PARK, a joint venture focused on modernizing legacy systems, particularly mainframe computer systems, in Japan.  This addresses the growing challenge of outdated IT infrastructure and a rapidly aging COBOL programmer workforce.  The partnership leverages FPT's global reach and expertise, combined with SCSK's deep understanding of the Japanese market.  COBOL PARK aims to provide technology solutions and skilled personnel, contributing to Japan's digital transformation efforts, focusing initially on the sizable financial sector market estimated at 500 billion yen.  The venture also highlights FPT's broader strategy for global expansion and market penetration in key areas like AI and semiconductors.

title: FPT Digital tư vấn lộ trình chuyển đổi số toàn diện tại PVOIL
summary: FPT Digital is advising PVOIL, a major Vietnamese oil and gas company, on a comprehensive digital transformation roadmap from 2024 to 2030.  The project involves assessing PVOIL's current digital state, developing a strategic roadmap for digital transformation, and creating a technological infrastructure plan.  FPT Digital will also implement automation solutions, develop a communication plan, and conduct training programs to ensure a smooth transition.  This partnership aims to enhance PVOIL's operational efficiency, service quality, and competitiveness by leveraging digital technologies.

title: Vừa nhận cổ tức xong, cổ đông FPT lại sắp "bỏ túi" gần 1.500 tỷ đồng tạm ứng cho năm 2024
summary: FPT will temporarily pay out 10% of its 2023 dividend, totaling roughly 1,460 billion VND, to shareholders in Q4 2024.  This follows a 10% dividend payment in June 2024.  Additionally, FPT announced an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP) for 2024, with 226 employees buying 7.3 million shares and 7 senior executives buying 3.3 million shares.  FPT's strong financial performance in the first half of 2024, with 21.4% revenue growth and 19.8% profit growth, supports these dividend payouts.  The stock price also reached a new high, reflecting investor confidence in FPT's continued success.

title: FPT hợp tác với Prudential Việt Nam phát triển giải pháp công nghệ cao
summary: FPT and Prudential Vietnam are partnering to implement comprehensive digital transformation solutions, focusing on enhancing efficiency and customer experience.  FPT will advise on IT strategies and provide technology solutions, including cashless payment options.  The collaboration aims to optimize Prudential's service processing, particularly in electronic transactions through the PRUOnline app.  This partnership reflects both companies' commitment to leveraging technology for improved customer experience and broader market reach.  Visa is also a key partner in this initiative.

title: Bộ đôi cổ phiếu bán lẻ FPT Retail và Thế Giới Di Động bất ngờ tăng mạnh trước “giờ G” công bố kết quả kinh doanh quý 4
summary: FPT Retail (FRT) and Thế Giới Di Động (MWG) saw significant stock price increases just before the release of their Q4 2023 earnings reports.  This suggests investor optimism about positive earnings.  Other retailers like PNJ, also had a positive Q4 2023.  While the overall retail sector is expected to show some recovery in 2024 due to easing economic pressures,  some challenges remain, including continued price competition in the electronics market, potentially impacting profit margins.  Inventory management, particularly for electronics products, is noted as a key factor in maintaining profitability in this market segment.

title: FPT Software xếp hạng Người đột phá tại báo cáo uy tín ngành công nghiệp
summary: FPT Software has been recognized as a "Disruptive Player" in the IDC Marketscape report for its innovative solutions in intelligent manufacturing operations.  Specifically, the company's AI-powered platform, I2, has demonstrated significant success in improving quality control in automotive manufacturing, reducing inspection time by 70%.  The report highlights FPT Software's ability to leverage AI, on-shore, near-shore, and off-shore resources, providing comprehensive solutions to global manufacturers.  Recent partnerships with leading AI companies like Landing AI and Mila further underscore their commitment to cutting-edge technology.

title: BCTC quý 3/2024 chiều ngày 23/10: FPT Telecom (FOX) báo lãi trước thuế hơn 900 tỷ, DN khoáng sản có lãi tăng 220%
summary: FPT Telecom (FOX) reported strong Q3 2024 earnings, with profit before tax reaching 907 billion VND, a 16% increase year-over-year.  Cumulative profit for the first nine months of 2024 also saw a 16% increase.  Several other companies, including a mineral producer (with a 220% profit increase), a bank (with 19% growth), and a company specializing in disinfection products, also reported positive financial results for Q3 2024.  However, some companies, like a hydropower firm (DNH) and a jewelry company (PNJ), saw profit decreases or slower growth compared to prior periods.  Overall, the results reflect mixed performance across various sectors.

title: FPT và Udemy ký kết hợp tác đào tạo nhân lực
summary: FPT has partnered with Udemy to provide its employees with access to a wide range of online courses.  This is part of FPT's ongoing commitment to employee development and upskilling.  Udemy will provide standard courses as well as specialized courses in Japanese and Korean for FPT employees in those regions.  The partnership reflects FPT's focus on continuous learning and development for its large workforce.  Udemy's extensive course library and expertise in online learning will complement FPT's existing internal training programs.

title: VPBank hợp tác FPT IS triển khai giải pháp CRM hàng đầu từ Salesforce
summary: VPBank and FPT IS are collaborating to implement Salesforce Financial Services Cloud, a leading CRM solution, for VPBank's personal customer segment.  FPT IS will deploy the cloud-based CRM system, focusing on sales and customer service processes.  The goal is to enhance customer understanding, improve service efficiency, and personalize customer experience for VPBank's 13 million personal customers.  This initiative reflects VPBank's commitment to digital transformation and its aspiration to become a top 100 Asian bank by 2030.  The project, with a 10-month timeframe,  is expected to significantly benefit VPBank's customer service operations.

title: FPT đầu tư toàn bộ 200 triệu USD cho AI Factory hợp tác với NVIDIA: 'Tư duy phải nước ngoài đầu tư mới giá trị là tư duy của người làm thuê, của kẻ yếu'
summary: FPT's investment of US$200 million in its AI Factory, in partnership with NVIDIA, is not about receiving foreign investment, but about gaining access to NVIDIA's global AI ecosystem and technology, according to FPT executive Đỗ Cao Bảo.  Bảo argues that FPT's focus is not on receiving capital, but rather on securing a strategic partnership that grants access to global markets, technology, and talent.  The partnership reflects a proactive approach by FPT to establish itself as a leading player in the global AI landscape rather than merely benefitting from foreign investment.

title: Ông Trương Gia Bình: 7 trường Đại học ở Đài Loan sang ĐH Bách Khoa, ĐH FPT để tuyển người cho ngành bán dẫn, sẵn sàng tài trợ học phí, vé máy bay, sinh hoạt phí...
summary: Chủ tịch FPT, Trương Gia Bình, cảnh báo Việt Nam chỉ có 18 tháng để nắm bắt cơ hội phát triển công nghiệp bán dẫn.  Ông nhấn mạnh sự cấp thiết phải đào tạo nguồn nhân lực lớn cho ngành này, khi nhiều trường đại học ở Đài Loan đang đến Việt Nam để tuyển dụng sinh viên, sẵn sàng tài trợ học phí, vé máy bay, và chi phí sinh hoạt.  Bình luận này phản ánh sự cạnh tranh khốc liệt trong việc thu hút nguồn nhân lực chất lượng cao cho ngành bán dẫn trên toàn cầu, và Việt Nam đang phải nhanh chóng hành động để đáp ứng nhu cầu này.

title: FPT Long Châu chủ động và cam kết bình ổn giá thuốc
summary: FPT Long Châu, a major Vietnamese pharmaceutical retailer, is actively maintaining stable drug prices despite rising global costs.  They proactively monitor market trends and work closely with manufacturers to ensure a consistent supply of affordable medications.  The company emphasizes its social responsibility, going beyond its core business to support communities through initiatives like free medication distribution and health consultations, demonstrating a commitment to public well-being.  FPT Long Châu plans to continue monitoring price fluctuations and adjusting strategies to mitigate the impact on patients' healthcare costs.

title: Hai "ông lớn" bán lẻ đóng thêm cả trăm cửa hàng FPT Shop và Điện Máy Xanh
summary: FPT Retail, during the first half of 2024, saw significant growth, primarily driven by the FPT Long Châu pharmacy chain.  Long Châu's revenue surged by 67% to 11.521 trillion VND, exceeding the performance of FPT Shop, which saw its own revenue growth but a decline in the number of stores as FPT Retail streamlined its operations, closing around 100 underperforming outlets.  Despite store closures, FPT Shop maintained relatively stable sales per store, and overall sales for FPT Retail remained strong.  The company is also expanding into new product categories like home appliances, alongside its core ICT offerings. Meanwhile,  competitors like Thế Giới Di Động also saw a significant reduction in the number of their stores across their various chains (The Gioi Di Dong and Dien May Xanh). These closures,  were intended to optimize the operational efficiency of the retailer.  Both companies are responding to the evolving market by adjusting their store networks and product offerings.

title: FPT Digital chuyển giao chiến lược và lộ trình Chuyển đổi số tại Tổng công ty Điện lực - TKV hướng tới Chuyển đổi số toàn diện, trở thành doanh nghiệp số và phát triển bền vững vào năm 2030
summary: FPT Digital has advised state-owned power company TKV on a comprehensive digital transformation roadmap, aiming for full digitization by 2030.  The plan involves leveraging technology across all operations, including data-driven decision-making, improved interactions with external parties, and automation of production processes.  The project will be implemented in phases over the next two quarters, focusing on assessing the current state of digitization, developing a comprehensive strategy and roadmap, and finally implementing training programs for staff.  FPT Digital's expertise in digital transformation will help TKV achieve its goals of becoming a more agile and technologically advanced organization, while also enhancing sustainability efforts.

title: Long Châu tăng trưởng 60%, FPT Retail phải thưởng hiệu quả kinh doanh vượt xa kế hoạch
summary: FPT Retail's Q4 2023 results showed a mixed picture.  While the overall company revenue was slightly up (3%) compared to the same period in 2022, driven largely by the 60% growth of the FPT Long Châu pharmacy chain, FPT Shop's revenue declined by 27%.  Long Châu's strong performance was partially offset by one-time costs (e.g., bonuses, inventory write-offs, store closures)  leading to a net loss of 97 billion VND.  Despite the challenges in the ICT retail segment, FPT Shop maintained a comparable gross profit margin in Q4 through product diversification and new service offerings, and FPT Retail's overall revenue for the year was up by 6%.  Long Châu remains a key driver of revenue and growth for the company.

title: Chủ tịch Trương Gia Bình: "Uy tín thị trường chứng khoán Việt Nam ảnh hưởng trực tiếp đến doanh thu FPT"
summary: Chủ tịch FPT, Trương Gia Bình, cho rằng uy tín của thị trường chứng khoán Việt Nam ảnh hưởng trực tiếp đến doanh thu của FPT.  Ông nhấn mạnh rằng, các nhà đầu tư nước ngoài quan tâm đến uy tín và tính minh bạch của một doanh nghiệp niêm yết khi xem xét đầu tư, chứ không chỉ đơn thuần là nguồn vốn.  Ông Bình đề xuất sử dụng công nghệ thông tin và trí tuệ nhân tạo để nâng cao năng suất lao động và quản trị doanh nghiệp, đặc biệt trong bối cảnh thị trường chứng khoán Việt Nam đang hướng tới nâng cấp.

title: FPT Retail (FRT) 2024: Long Châu tiếp tục “gánh team”, sẽ mở thêm 400 nhà thuốc để đạt mốc 1.900
summary: FPT Retail's 2024 outlook is heavily reliant on the continued strong performance of its FPT Long Châu pharmacy chain.  While FPT Shop is expected to see flat revenue growth, Long Châu is projected to increase revenue by double digits.  To achieve this, Long Châu plans to open 400 new pharmacies, bringing the total to 1,900.  Despite a loss in 2023 due to economic headwinds and expansion efforts, FPT Retail anticipates a return to profitability and is projecting substantial growth for Long Châu in 2024.  Analysts are optimistic about Long Châu's prospects, with predictions of significant revenue and profit increases.

title: FPT dự kiến cung cấp dịch vụ đám mây và AI tại Nhật Bản
summary: FPT Software plans to launch AI and cloud services in Japan in early 2025, marking a significant expansion.  This initiative involves acquiring NVIDIA hardware, setting up a data center, and increasing its Japanese workforce to 5,000.  The target market is Japanese financial institutions, capitalizing on the need for data-driven solutions.  The move reflects FPT's broader strategy of global expansion and its commitment to AI and cloud technologies.  Japan currently represents a substantial portion of FPT Software's revenue, and the company aims to further solidify its presence in this market.

title: Chủ tịch FPT Trương Gia Bình cam kết đào tạo 10.000 kỹ sư bán dẫn
summary: FPT, along with other Vietnamese businesses and the government, is committed to training 10,000 semiconductor engineers by 2030.  This initiative is part of a larger national effort to train 50,000 semiconductor engineers and is driven by the increasing global demand and the need to solidify Vietnam's position in this sector.  FPT, in particular, is actively engaging with universities and international partners to develop and implement training programs to meet this goal.  The need for skilled labor in the semiconductor industry is highlighted, and the initiative aims to position Vietnam as a key player in this global sector.

title: Cổ phiếu FPT lại vượt đỉnh “như một thói quen”, giá trị tập đoàn công nghệ số 1 Việt Nam vượt VietinBank, Techcombank, VPBank
summary: FPT's stock price hit a new high, surpassing VietinBank and Techcombank in market capitalization, reaching nearly 177,000 billion VND (~7.3 billion USD).  This surge is attributed to strong Q1 and Q2 2024 financial results, with revenue and profit exceeding expectations.  The projected dividend payout of 10% and the upcoming share issuance also contributed to investor confidence.  Analysts link the stock's performance to positive investor sentiment regarding FPT's strategic partnerships, particularly in AI and semiconductors with NVIDIA, driving long-term growth expectations.  FPT's consistent financial performance and expansion into new markets are key factors in its market value rise.

title: FPT IS được vinh danh đối tác tốt nhất tại SAP SEA Partner Success Summit 2024
summary: FPT IS, a Vietnamese IT services provider, won three awards at the SAP South East Asia Partner Success Summit 2024: Best Rise Partner, Best Midmarket Partner, and Best Partner of the Year.  These awards recognize FPT IS's success in implementing SAP solutions for various industries, including pharmaceuticals (GONSA), food retail (Siba Food), and furniture (Trần Đức).  FPT IS's strength lies in its deep industry expertise, comprehensive technology solutions, and strong partnerships, enabling clients to optimize operations, improve efficiency, and make data-driven decisions.  The awards highlight FPT IS's role in Vietnam's digital transformation efforts and its growing global presence.

title: FPT lãi hơn 1.000 tỷ trong tháng 8, mảng dịch vụ CNTT nước ngoài tiếp tục bứt phá
summary: FPT reported strong financial results for the first 8 months of 2024, with revenue up 20.8% to 39,664 billion VND and profit before tax up nearly 20% to 7,077 billion VND.  A key driver was the international IT services segment, which saw a 30.4% revenue increase, boosted by strong growth in Japan and the APAC region.  FPT also achieved record profit in August, with pre-tax profit exceeding 1,000 billion VND.  The company's expansion into new markets, like Sweden, is also highlighted.  Overall, FPT's performance reflects consistent growth and a significant commitment to international expansion in the tech sector.

title: Khám phá hệ sinh thái AI - bán dẫn FPT tại Ngày hội đổi mới sáng tạo Việt Nam 2024
summary: At Innovate Vietnam 2024, FPT showcased its AI and semiconductor ecosystems.  They presented FPT Chip Inside, highlighting their semiconductor products, including a 65W charger.  Their AI ecosystem included Intelligent Inspection (I2) for factory automation, FPT GenAI products (AI Mentor, AI Knowledge Explore, and AI TOVA), and automation solutions like akaCam and akaBot.  The goal was to demonstrate FPT's commitment to innovation and to position Vietnam as a hub for AI and semiconductor technology.

title: Bứt phá tăng trưởng với ba gói giải pháp ERP chuyên biệt từ FPT IS
summary: FPT IS, a leading tech firm in Vietnam, is partnering with SAP to offer specialized cloud-based ERP solutions (SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public) tailored for financial, commercial, and manufacturing businesses.  The solutions are designed to be quickly implemented (3-5 months) and cost-effective, with a focus on automation and data-driven decision-making.  FPT IS's expertise in ERP implementation, coupled with its deep understanding of the Vietnamese market and industry-specific solutions, positions them as a key partner for businesses undergoing digital transformation.  This partnership highlights the growing trend of cloud-based ERP adoption and FPT IS's commitment to supporting Vietnam's digital economy.

title: FPT hợp tác Oracle thúc đẩy giải pháp quản trị rủi ro tài chính tại 6 thị trường lớn
summary: FPT and Oracle are partnering to deploy Oracle's OFSAA (Financial Services Analytical Applications) solution in six key markets (Japan, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, and Vietnam).  This system is designed to help financial institutions manage financial risk, compliance, and reporting, including AML (Anti-Money Laundering), KYC (Know Your Customer), and sanctions compliance.  FPT, with extensive experience in financial services and technology implementation, will be a crucial partner in deploying this cutting-edge solution across the region.  The partnership targets the significant financial risks and compliance challenges prevalent in developing economies, particularly in the Asian-Pacific region.

title: Phiên 23/5: Khối ngoại đảo chiều mua ròng, ngược chiều bán mạnh FPT
summary: On May 23rd, foreign investors reversed their selling trend and bought into the Vietnamese market, particularly buying into DBC, MWG, HPG, PC1, and FUEVFVND stocks.  However, FPT and VHM were the top sellers, with significant amounts of shares sold off.  While the overall market saw a positive increase, the shift in foreign investor activity was notable, with a reversal of the previous selling trend.

title: FPT Long Châu và Boehringer Ingelheim đẩy mạnh hợp tác
summary: FPT Long Châu, a leading Vietnamese pharmacy chain, deepened its strategic partnership with Boehringer Ingelheim, a global pharmaceutical company.  The visit by Boehringer Ingelheim executives highlighted FPT Long Châu's digital transformation initiatives, including its use of technology for inventory management, order fulfillment, and customer service.  This collaboration underscores FPT Long Châu's commitment to providing high-quality healthcare solutions and access to advanced treatments, particularly for chronic conditions like diabetes and respiratory illnesses, in Vietnam.  The partnership is mutually beneficial, with Boehringer Ingelheim gaining a strategic partner in Vietnam and FPT Long Châu enhancing its position in the market and expanding its healthcare ecosystem.

title: Niềm vui của cổ đông FPT
summary: FPT's stock price reached a new all-time high, solidifying its position as one of Vietnam's largest publicly traded companies.  This strong performance is driven by robust financial results, with a projected 18% increase in revenue and profit for 2024.  A key factor is the significant growth in international IT services, particularly in Japan and the Asia-Pacific region.  Further supporting the stock's surge is FPT's planned dividend payment (10% in cash) and share issuance, adding to investor confidence.  The company's consistent profitability and strategic investments, especially in AI and automotive technology, are key drivers for investor optimism.

title: "Tất cả đều phải là AI", FPT tuyên bố đặt cược tất cả tương lai vào AI, vậy mảng AI của FPT đang làm ăn thế nào?
summary: FPT is heavily investing in AI, with 200 million USD allocated to an AI Factory in Vietnam.  The company's financial results for the first half of 2024 show strong growth, driven largely by its technology sector, including significant increases in international IT services revenue.  FPT is aggressively expanding its AI capabilities through partnerships with NVIDIA, leading AI researchers, and establishing AI-focused research labs globally.  The company's strategy is to become deeply involved in AI across all aspects of its business, demanding a high level of AI expertise from every employee and division.

title: Loạt cổ phiếu công nghệ tạo đồ thị 'cây thông', quãng thời gian huy hoàng của các cổ phiếu họ FPT, Viettel, Mobifone đã qua?
summary: A recent market downturn saw a number of Vietnamese tech stocks, including those associated with FPT, Viettel, and others, experience significant declines.  While these stocks had seen substantial gains earlier in the year, analysts attribute the correction to factors like investor profit-taking, potentially overvalued stock prices, and the prospect of broader market recovery pulling investment from the tech sector into other sectors.  Despite the short-term pullback, analysts remain positive about the long-term growth potential of the technology sector in Vietnam, driven by factors like AI, semiconductors, and cloud computing.

title: Thế 'bánh kẹp' của TGDĐ và FPT Shop: Offline thì bị 'trẻ vị thành niên' CellphoneS & ShopDunk kèn cựa, online khó đấu nổi Shopee & Lazada dù có chịu 'đốt tiền'
summary: FPT Shop and Thế Giới Di Động face increasing pressure from online marketplaces like Shopee and Lazada, as consumer buying habits shift online.  While these offline retailers have begun to increase their online presence, their financial resources are insufficient to compete with the scale and efficiency of large online platforms.  The report highlights a significant decline in offline ICT/CE sales for major retailers in recent years, contrasting with the growth of online marketplaces.  The trend suggests that offline retailers face a difficult path to profitability unless they can significantly increase their online presence and develop strategies to better compete with these larger, more established platforms.

title: FPT muốn xây dựng Tổ hợp giáo dục quy mô 5-10ha ở Hải Dương
summary: FPT is proposing to build a large-scale education complex in Hải Dương, encompassing primary through high school education, and potentially expanding to vocational training at the college and university level.  The complex is estimated to cover 5-10 hectares.  FPT aims to provide an internationally recognized education model with domestic tuition fees, focused on vocational training aligned with local business needs.  Simultaneously, FPT is emphasizing its commitment to digital transformation initiatives in Hải Dương,  building on previous collaborations and offering solutions including digital government, healthcare, education, and IT infrastructure.  The province supports the initiative.

title: Nhà thông minh hiện đại không "hại điện" với FPT Smart Home
summary: FPT Smart Home's digital solutions aim to help consumers save on energy costs.  The system, controlled through the FPT Life app, allows remote control and scheduling of household appliances like lights and air conditioning.  Smart sensors further optimize energy use by automatically adjusting lighting and temperature settings based on occupancy and environmental factors.  These features, combined with the ability to control appliances remotely, offer significant energy savings (up to 30% per month) and enhanced safety, particularly important for homes with children or elderly residents.  The solutions are lauded for their practicality and user-friendliness.

title: 'Lão tướng' sáng lập FPT nói về câu hỏi: Cổ phiếu công nghệ toàn cầu giảm mạnh, AI đã qua thời, ChatGPT là cú lừa?
summary: Despite some global investor concern over AI stock valuations, FPT's chairman, Đỗ Cao Bảo, argues that AI's long-term growth potential remains strong.  He points to continued investment in AI by global tech giants like NVIDIA (despite recent stock fluctuations), Tesla, and Amazon as evidence of sustained interest and development.  FPT's own strong financial results and strategic partnerships with AI companies, particularly its $200 million investment in an AI factory and collaboration with Nvidia, are highlighted as reasons for maintaining confidence in the sector's future.  Bảo also emphasizes FPT's proactive approach to securing key partnerships and developing a strong domestic AI talent pool to capitalize on this growth opportunity.

title: Central Retail, Saigon Co.op, Thế giới Di động, FPT Retail, PNJ… lọt Top những công ty bán lẻ uy tín nhất Việt Nam
summary: Vietnam Report's 2024 ranking of top Vietnamese retail companies shows Central Retail, Saigon Co.op, and Thế Giới Di Động among the most prominent.  The ranking considers financial strength, media presence, and market surveys.  The report notes the intense competition within the retail sector, which is driving restructuring and shaping the market.  While the retail sector experienced challenges in 2023, with decreased consumer spending, early 2024 signals a positive trend.  Analysts predict continued growth fueled by urbanization, rising incomes, and a significant middle class, with a projected increase in consumer spending.

title: FPT Telecom phải dự phòng toàn bộ 63 tỷ đồng nợ xấu của một công ty bán nước tăng lực
summary: FPT Telecom (FOX) reported a significant increase in bad debt, reaching 630 billion VND in 2023.  A substantial portion of this, 63 billion VND, is specifically attributed to a company called SNLKT, a key sponsor of the V-League.  While FPT Telecom's overall financial performance for 2023 was strong, with record profit, this specific bad debt creates a financial risk that needs further clarification.

title: Ông Đỗ Cao Bảo: Nhờ có AI, FPT và Việt Nam đang có lần đầu cùng điểm xuất phát với các quốc gia trên thế giới
summary: FPT's chairman, Đỗ Cao Bảo, believes Vietnam, through FPT's efforts, now has a similar starting point to other developed nations in AI.  He argues that FPT's substantial investment in AI, including the recruitment of 50 AI PhDs and a $200M AI Factory, positions the company to compete globally.  Bảo emphasizes FPT's commitment to AI, semiconductors, and autonomous vehicles, not just as business ventures, but as strategic investments for Vietnam's future in the global tech landscape.  This assertion contrasts with some external skepticism about the viability of these ambitions.

title: Đứt chuỗi 5 tháng tăng trưởng, quỹ ngoại quy mô 20.000 tỷ vẫn tự tin với loạt cổ phiếu “hot” trong danh mục, bao gồm FPT, CMG
summary: Despite a recent market downturn, Pyn Elite Fund, a large foreign investment fund, maintains a positive outlook on Vietnamese stocks, particularly those in the tech sector.  The fund, which holds significant stakes in FPT and CMC Corp, experienced a negative return in April due to banking sector headwinds and a weakening VND.  However,  the fund remains optimistic about the long-term prospects of the Vietnamese market, driven by economic indicators like rising FDI, retail sales, and tourism, plus an anticipated easing of interest rates.  They see a good opportunity for growth, despite some short-term concerns and profit-taking by investors.

title: Sếp FPT: Trong lịch sử của nhân loại không có bất cứ công ty nào có sự tăng trưởng giá trị nhanh chóng và kỳ lạ như Nvidia
summary: NVIDIA's stock price has surged, reaching a record high and surpassing Microsoft in market capitalization.  FPT executive Đỗ Cao Bảo attributes this extraordinary growth to the explosive development of AI, noting that NVIDIA, a chip manufacturer, has become a key player in the AI revolution.  Bảo points out that, historically, no company has experienced such rapid valuation growth as NVIDIA, even comparing it to tech giants like Apple, Microsoft, and Google, and argues that this is driven by AI's transformative potential across various sectors.  The article emphasizes NVIDIA's crucial role as a foundational technology company in the current AI boom.

title: LPBank muốn mua 5% vốn FPT, có thể phải bỏ ra gần 10.000 tỷ đồng
summary: LPBank plans to acquire a 5% stake in FPT, potentially requiring an investment of over 9,800 billion VND.  This move reflects LPBank's strategy to diversify its investments and capitalize on FPT's strong performance and projected growth, particularly in AI, cloud, and big data.  FPT's consistent stock price appreciation, dividend payouts, and inclusion in the VN30 index are cited as factors supporting this investment decision.  The proposed transaction is subject to regulatory approvals and market conditions.

title: Sếp FPT: “Hàng hóa trên Temu không có gì mới, hàng Việt Nam vẫn sống ổn”
summary: FPT executive Đỗ Cao Bảo argues that the hype surrounding Temu, a Chinese online retailer, is largely media-driven and doesn't represent a significant threat to Vietnamese manufacturers.  He contends that Temu's offerings are largely similar to products already available on other e-commerce platforms in Vietnam.  The key difference is that Temu primarily deals directly with manufacturers, bypassing traditional retailers.  Bảo believes this indirect competition might actually benefit the Vietnamese economy by forcing smaller businesses to innovate and focus on higher-quality, branded goods rather than simply importing cheap, no-name items.  He also emphasizes that Temu's non-compliance with Vietnamese tax laws is likely to be addressed by authorities.

title: Được huyền thoại CNTT Ấn Độ khen là độc nhất vô nhị, CEO FPT mơ Việt Nam có nhiều kỳ lân như nước bạn, sớm kiếm thêm 1 tỷ USD lần thứ 2
summary: FPT's CEO, Nguyễn Văn Khoa, discussed Vietnam's potential in the tech sector, particularly in AI and semiconductors, following a visit from Infosys founder Narayana Murthy.  Murthy praised Vietnam's potential to become a global tech hub, noting FPT's unique position in the region.  Khoa highlighted FPT's recent successes, including a large US contract, and its ambitious goal of reaching 5 billion USD in overseas IT services revenue by 2030, and the projected 1 million employee milestone by 2035.  The discussion underscored FPT's aggressive strategy to expand in AI, semiconductors, and automotive technologies, along with significant investments in training and talent development.

title: Chủ tịch FPT Software, Tập đoàn FPT, nhận giải thưởng từ tổ chức CNTT Quốc tế ASOCIO
summary: FPT Software's chairwoman, Chu Thị Thanh Hà, was honored with three awards at the ASOCIO Awards 2024, recognizing her leadership and contributions to the tech industry.  She was recognized as Best Rise Partner, Best Midmarket Partner, and Best Partner of the Year, highlighting her role in driving technological solutions and digital transformation.  The awards acknowledge her leadership in FPT Software, including its successful expansion into international markets (reaching $1 billion in overseas software revenue).  The recognition also acknowledges her advocacy for women in tech.

title: Hai cổ phiếu "họ" FPT cùng 1 mã bất động sản chính thức chính thức lọt rổ FTSE Vietnam ETF trong kỳ cơ cấu tháng 9
summary: In a quarterly review, FTSE Russell added three stocks—FPT's FTS, FPT Retail's FRT, and Nhà Khang Điền's KDH—to the FTSE Vietnam Index.  This brings the total number of stocks in the index to 31.  The changes will take effect after the close of trading on Friday, September 20, 2024.  This move reflects continued investor interest in these companies, especially given the positive performance of FRT and FTS, and the improved free-float for KDH. The FTSE Vietnam ETF, which tracks this index, has a substantial market capitalization (around 7,300 billion VND).

title: FPT Long Châu hợp tác OMRON Healthcare cung cấp chuỗi thiết bị y tế thế hệ mới
summary: FPT Long Châu and OMRON Healthcare are partnering to bring advanced medical devices to the Vietnamese market.  This includes the importation and distribution of OMRON's blood pressure monitors and electrotherapy devices.  The collaboration aims to improve healthcare quality and patient outcomes, particularly in managing chronic conditions.  Beyond product distribution, the partnership also involves training FPT Long Châu's pharmacists in the use and application of these new technologies.  This strategic alliance allows FPT Long Châu to provide access to cutting-edge medical technology while strengthening its position as a comprehensive healthcare provider in Vietnam.

title: FPT Software đầu tư 125 tỷ đồng đào tạo nguồn lực ICT tiếng Nhật
summary: FPT Software is investing heavily in training Vietnamese ICT talent to meet the growing demand for Japanese-speaking IT professionals in Japan.  The company is providing scholarships for students to study Japanese and participate in exchange programs.  FPT aims to equip these students with at least N3 Japanese proficiency upon graduation to better serve Japanese companies.  This initiative reflects FPT's commitment to developing a skilled workforce and capitalizing on the significant demand for IT talent in Japan, particularly in the face of a predicted shortage of skilled Japanese-speaking ICT professionals.

title: Chủ tịch Trương Gia Bình nói gì khi FPT trở thành “nhân vật chính” trong bộ phim tài liệu của Discovery?
summary: FPT, a leading Vietnamese tech company, is featured prominently in a Discovery Channel documentary about Vietnam's tech revolution.  The documentary highlights FPT's journey and contributions to Vietnam's burgeoning IT sector over the past two decades.  FPT's chairman, Trương Gia Bình, and chairwoman of FPT Software, Chu Thị Thanh Hà, emphasize the company's pioneering spirit, particularly its bold decisions and commitment to global expansion and technological advancement in AI, semiconductors, and automotive, aiming to achieve 5 billion USD in overseas IT revenue by 2030. The documentary underscores Vietnam's remarkable progress in the tech industry and FPT's role as a key driver of this development.

title: FPT Play sở hữu độc quyền bản quyền trình chiếu Miss Universe 2024 tại Việt Nam: Người hâm mộ dễ dàng ủng hộ đại diện Kỳ Duyên trên đấu trường quốc tế
summary: FPT Play will exclusively broadcast the Miss Universe 2024 competition in Vietnam.  This marks the first time a Vietnamese platform has secured these rights.  The competition, featuring a record number of contestants and new presentation formats, will be livestreamed on FPT Play, allowing Vietnamese viewers to support their representative, Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên.  The broadcast highlights FPT's increasing role in supporting and showcasing Vietnamese talent on a global platform.

title: Ông Trương Gia Bình: FPT sẽ cùng NVIDIA biến Việt Nam và Nhật Bản thành quốc gia AI
summary: FPT launched an AI Factory in Japan, a partnership with NVIDIA, aiming to establish Vietnam and Japan as AI hubs.  The factory provides GPU cloud services, AI development tools (FPT AI Studio), and deployment capabilities (FPT AI Inference).  FPT intends to leverage this AI infrastructure to develop and deploy AI solutions for global clients, particularly in the financial and automotive sectors.  The move underscores FPT's commitment to AI, global expansion, and creating a significant domestic AI talent pool.

title: Thêm hai mã chứng khoán 'họ' FPT chính thức vượt mốc 100.000 đồng/cổ phiếu
summary: FPT Telecom (FOX) and FPT Corporation (FPT) stock prices reached new highs, with FOX hitting a record 106,900 VND per share.  This surge is linked to FPT's strong overall performance, including a projected 18% increase in revenue and profit for 2024, driven by its international IT services segment, especially in Japan and the Asia-Pacific region.  The recent partnership with NVIDIA and investments in AI are also cited as positive factors.  FPT Retail (FRT) also saw strong growth, largely due to the expansion of its FPT Long Châu pharmacy chain, resulting in significant gains in Q1 2024.  The positive performance of these FPT-related stocks comes despite market fluctuations.

title: Chiến giá quyết liệt với Thế giới Di động, CellphoneS... FPT Shop ước tính tổn thất bao nhiêu?
summary: FPT Retail, particularly its FPT Shop division, suffered significant losses in 2023 due to intense price wars with competitors like Thế Giới Di Động.  This aggressive pricing strategy, initiated by Thế Giới Di Động, caused FPT Shop's gross profit margin to plummet to 8% in Q2 2023, compared to an average of 14% previously.  As a result, FPT Shop closed approximately 30 stores and is expected to close another 50.  FPT Retail is shifting its focus to diversification, particularly into the home appliance sector, and virtual mobile services, to recover lost ground and hopefully improve margins.  While FPT Long Châu (the pharmacy chain) experienced substantial growth and profitability, it's the main driver for FPT Retail's overall positive performance in 2023.  The report suggests the overall ICT retail sector is now saturated, and competition is fierce, making it difficult for established players to maintain margins in the face of aggressive pricing from newer competitors.

title: Khối ngoại “xả hàng” không cản được FPT vượt đỉnh, vốn hóa công ty công nghệ số 1 Việt Nam xấp xỉ 200.000 tỷ, bằng 12 ngân hàng cộng lại
summary: Despite significant foreign selling pressure, FPT stock reached a new high, surpassing VietinBank and Techcombank in market capitalization, reaching nearly 200,000 billion VND (~8.4 billion USD).  This remarkable performance is fueled by strong financial results in the first five months of 2024, particularly the international IT services segment, with notable gains in Japan and the Asia-Pacific region.  FPT's substantial projected 2024 revenue and profit targets are also driving investor confidence.  While foreign investors have been selling FPT shares, the stock continues its upward trend, reflecting investor confidence in the company's long-term prospects.

title: FPT trước khi trở thành "ông lớn công nghệ": Hợp tác với Vinamilk làm bột dinh dưỡng, mua đến 90% cổ phần một hợp tác xã may
summary: In its early years, FPT, now a leading Vietnamese tech firm, ventured into diverse sectors like textiles and food processing.  A 1991 investment in a textile joint venture, however, resulted in a loss of capital due to a lack of management experience.  Similarly, an attempt to develop a food technology product based on quinoa also ended in failure due to issues with product quality.  These early setbacks, according to FPT's founders, served as valuable learning experiences, ultimately shaping the company's focus on technology and its current success.

title: Sau FPT, tập đoàn sản xuất chip Nvidia trị giá 2.000 tỷ USD tiếp tục hợp tác với 'kỳ lân' công nghệ VNG
summary: VNG, a major Vietnamese tech company, has partnered with NVIDIA, a global chip manufacturer, for cloud computing services.  This involves equipping a VNG data center in Thailand with Nvidia GPUs to support AI and software services.  The collaboration is part of a broader effort by NVIDIA to expand its presence in Asia, following visits to the region by its CEO, and FPT's similar ventures.  VNG's focus on AI-related services like Zalo positions them to benefit from the growing global demand for AI technologies.  The partnership also signifies a potential boost for VNG's future growth, despite a recent operating loss in 2023.

title: FPT lần thứ 35 vượt đỉnh từ đầu năm, vốn hóa tập đoàn tư nhân lớn nhất Việt Nam vượt 200.000 tỷ
summary: FPT's stock price surged to a new all-time high, exceeding 140,000 VND per share,  pushing its market capitalization to nearly 205,000 billion VND (~8.4 billion USD).  This makes FPT the largest privately-held company on the Vietnamese stock exchange, surpassing others like Vingroup.  The strong performance is tied to robust financial results in the first eight months of 2024, with 20.8% revenue growth and nearly 20% growth in profit before tax.  International IT services revenue, especially in Japan and APAC, are key drivers of this growth.  Further, FPT's strategic partnerships, including those with NVIDIA and ongoing expansion into new markets like Sweden and Germany, contribute to the positive outlook.  The company's aggressive investments in AI, semiconductors, and automotive technologies are also significant factors.

title: Phiên 11/6: Khối ngoại bán ròng gần 1.900 tỷ đồng, đẩy mạnh "chốt lãi" FPT
summary: Foreign investors sold a significant amount of Vietnamese stocks on June 11th, totaling nearly 1.9 trillion VND.  FPT was the largest target of foreign selling pressure, with over 260 billion VND worth of shares sold.  While some stocks saw buying activity, the overall trend was one of significant foreign selling, contributing to a market downturn on that day.

title: FPT muốn đầu tư Tổ hợp Giáo dục - Khoa học công nghệ quy mô 10-20ha tại Hải Phòng
summary: FPT is proposing to invest in a large-scale education and technology complex in Hải Phòng, covering primary through university levels, and software development.  The 10-20 hectare complex is intended to address the growing demand for skilled tech workers in fields like semiconductors and AI. FPT aims to create a complete ecosystem, including specialized training programs, in partnership with the city government and international companies.  The initiative reflects FPT's broader strategy to build a strong domestic technology workforce, and to leverage its existing relationships with international partners to attract further investment into the area.

title: FPT Shop cũng bắt đầu mở bán máy lạnh
summary: FPT Shop has launched a nationwide sale of air conditioners, offering various models from leading brands like Casper, Daikin, and Midea.  The prices start at just over 5 million VND, and include incentives like free installation, zero-interest financing, and warranties.  This move reflects FPT Shop's diversification strategy, aiming to increase its market share in the home appliances sector, which is expected to be more resilient than the currently saturated ICT market.  They are offering attractive financing options to make purchases more accessible.

title: FPT xây trung tâm trí tuệ nhân tạo hơn 4.000 tỷ đồng tại Bình Định, ông Trương Gia Bình tự tin tỉnh này sẽ sớm trở thành trung tâm AI của khu vực
summary: FPT is investing heavily in a new AI and technology hub in Quy Nhơn, Bình Định, with a planned investment of 4.362 billion VND (approximately $185 million).  The 93.24-hectare project, called the AI-Support City, aims to develop AI technology, training, and infrastructure.  It will include facilities for research, education (from primary to university level), and a supporting urban development component, with a target of attracting high-tech talent to the area.  FPT is particularly focused on developing a local AI talent pool and is collaborating with international companies in this field.

title: 25 năm liều ‘săn cá voi’ đến doanh thu tỷ USD nước ngoài của FPT
summary: FPT Software's 25-year journey of global expansion is detailed, highlighting its initial struggles and eventual success.  Starting with a small team and facing challenges like failed ventures in India and the US, FPT shifted its focus to Japan, establishing a strong presence there.  This early experience led to a more strategic approach to global partnerships and acquisitions, culminating in $1 billion in overseas IT services revenue in 2023.  The company's ambitious goal now is to achieve $5 billion in overseas revenue by 2030, reinforcing its position as a major player in the global tech market.  The article emphasizes FPT's strategic focus on building a strong global presence and expertise in key areas like AI, semiconductors, and automotive technology.

title: FPT Software vừa ký một hợp đồng 225 triệu USD bằng doanh số của một năm, lãnh đạo khẳng định mục tiêu lợi nhuận tỷ đô không còn xa
summary: FPT Software secured a US$225 million contract, exceeding its 17th-year revenue.  This significant win further positions the company as a substantial player in the global technology market.  Strong Q3 2024 financial results with double-digit growth in revenue and profit before tax are also highlighted, exceeding the company's own projections.  FPT is confident that its target of reaching US$5 billion in overseas revenue by 2030 is within reach.

title: FPT tiếp tục tăng trưởng “đều như vắt tranh” với động lực từ mảng CNTT nước ngoài, hé lộ kế hoạch xây dựng tổ hợp giáo dục tại Hải Dương
summary: FPT reported strong financial growth in the first five months of 2024, with 19.9% revenue growth and 19.5% profit growth, exceeding its projected targets.  The international IT services segment was a key driver, with significant gains in Japan and the Asia-Pacific region.  Further, FPT announced plans for a large-scale education complex in Hải Dương province and highlighted ongoing expansion into new markets and technologies, such as AI, automotive technology, and semiconductors.  These efforts reflect FPT's strategic focus on expanding globally, particularly in the rapidly growing tech sectors.

title: Chứng khoán tuần qua: VN-Index có 4/5 phiên tăng điểm, cổ phiếu FPT, MSN tiếp tục “bay cao”
summary: Despite a market downturn, several Vietnamese tech stocks, including FPT, MSN, and others, saw strong gains on October 11th.  The VN-Index dipped below 1,300, but the technology sector held its ground.  FPT reached a new 18-year high in price, driving its market capitalization to nearly 200,000 billion VND,  making it Vietnam's largest privately held company.  The positive performance is attributed to strong financial results, ongoing growth in the international IT services sector (particularly in Japan and APAC), and increasing investor interest due to the company's strategic partnerships and initiatives, especially in AI and semiconductors.  While some analysts caution about short-term volatility in the tech sector, the overall long-term outlook for these companies remains positive.

title: Vốn hóa FPT chỉ còn kém Vingroup chưa đến 1 phiên trần
summary: FPT's stock price surged to a new high on April 24th, pushing its market capitalization to nearly 153 trillion VND, just 6,500 billion VND behind Vingroup.  This significant gain places FPT among the top three largest publicly traded companies in Vietnam, a testament to its strong and consistent financial performance.  FPT's growth is attributed to robust revenue and profit increases, particularly in its international IT services segment. The recent partnership with NVIDIA, and consistent growth over the past decade, are further contributing factors to investor confidence.  While FPT is a close contender, catching Vingroup in market cap might prove difficult in the short term, given the potential for investor profit-taking and Vingroup's other significant business segments.

title: Xuất thân nghề giáo, cặp ‘bài trùng’ Chủ tịch Trương Gia Bình và cựu CEO Bùi Quang Ngọc cùng nhau gây dựng ‘đế chế’ FPT
summary: This article highlights the dual backgrounds of FPT's founders, Trương Gia Bình and Bùi Quang Ngọc, as educators and entrepreneurs.  It details their early career paths in academia, and how this foundation, combined with their entrepreneurial drive, laid the groundwork for FPT's later success.  The article emphasizes their initial forays into diverse ventures, including textile manufacturing and food technology (quinoa-based products), which, despite early failures, provided valuable learning experiences that ultimately shaped FPT's focus on technology.  The article ultimately portrays FPT's journey as one rooted in both academic rigor and practical application, culminating in its current position as a major player in the Vietnamese tech sector.

title: Tăng phi mã từ đầu năm, tổng giá trị các cổ phiếu họ Viettel và FPT đạt gần 330.000 tỷ đồng, nhiều mã có thị giá 3 chữ số
summary: Several Vietnamese tech stocks, particularly those associated with FPT and Viettel, experienced significant gains in the first half of 2024, driving up their combined market capitalization to nearly 330,000 billion VND.  The strong performance is attributed to robust financial results and positive market sentiment, particularly for the international IT services segment.  While some stocks, like FPT Online (FOC), showed slightly lower growth or even losses, the overall positive trend suggests investor confidence in the long-term growth prospects of these companies and the broader Vietnamese tech sector.

title: Sở hữu ngay iPhone 16 với nhiều ưu đãi tại sự kiện offline của FPT Shop và Zalopay
summary: FPT Shop held a two-day offline event in Ho Chi Minh City to launch the iPhone 16 series.  Partnering with Zalopay, the event offered exclusive discounts on iPhones for Zalopay users, including a direct 1 million VND discount for Zalopay QR code payments.  Other promotions included accessories, free screen protectors for older iPhones, and giveaways from Zalopay.  The event's success, with nearly 1,000 pre-orders fulfilled on the first night, demonstrates strong demand for the new iPhones and the appeal of the combined FPT Shop/Zalopay offerings.  A similar event is planned for Hanoi in early October.

title: Vinphaco và FPT IS khởi động dự án chuyển đổi số hoạt động quản trị doanh nghiệp
summary: Vinphaco, a leading Vietnamese pharmaceutical manufacturer, is partnering with FPT IS and SAP to implement a comprehensive digital transformation project using SAP S/4HANA.  This involves implementing core SAP modules for finance, procurement, supply chain, and production, along with FPT IS-developed mobile applications for staff and customers.  The project aims to improve operational efficiency, enhance data management, and ultimately drive sustainable growth for Vinphaco.  The collaboration, supported by USAID, signifies a commitment to modernizing processes in the Vietnamese pharmaceutical industry.

title: Phiên 26/6: Khối ngoại tiếp chuỗi 14 phiên bán ròng liên tiếp, tập trung "xả" mạnh FPT, MWG và nhiều cổ phiếu "hot"
summary: Foreign investors continued their selling spree on June 26th, offloading nearly 1.9 trillion VND worth of Vietnamese stocks, with FPT and MWG being among the most heavily targeted.  While the market saw some recovery, the overall trend was negative, marking the 14th consecutive day of foreign selling.  Despite this, some individual stocks saw buying interest, with TCB, DBC, and MSN seeing notable purchases.

title: Thị trường “cạn” thanh khoản, cổ phiếu FPT “gồng” chỉ số VN-Index
summary: FPT stock surged to a new high on November 27th, despite overall market weakness.  The strong performance of FPT, along with gains in some other FPT-related stocks,  was partially driven by a significant amount of buying by foreign investors.  However, overall market liquidity was extremely low, with trading volume on all three exchanges reaching a record low.  The market as a whole saw a slight decline.  This suggests investor focus on individual stocks rather than broad market movement.

title: Chăm sóc sức khỏe người bệnh mạn tính toàn diện cùng FPT Long Châu và Boehringer Ingelheim
summary: FPT Long Châu and Boehringer Ingelheim are collaborating on a comprehensive health initiative to address the growing burden of chronic diseases in Vietnam.  The campaign focuses on raising awareness, early detection, and proactive management of conditions like diabetes, heart disease, and kidney disease.  A key part of the initiative is free health screenings for diabetes, heart failure, and chronic kidney disease offered at FPT Long Châu pharmacies and community health centers.  The partnership aims to provide accessible and effective healthcare solutions for chronic patients, reducing financial strain on individuals and the healthcare system, and promoting overall community health.

title: Cổ phiếu “họ” FPT nổi sóng: “gã khổng lồ” công nghệ 25 lần vượt đỉnh từ đầu năm, FPT Telecom tăng bằng lần sau 5 tháng, FPT Retail gần chạm ngưỡng tỷ USD vốn hóa
summary: FPT and related companies experienced significant stock price increases, fueled by investor optimism surrounding the company's financial performance and strategic investments, particularly in the technology sector.  Strong growth in international IT services, especially in Japan and the Asia-Pacific region, and the company's recent partnership with NVIDIA are key factors driving investor confidence.  While the overall market exhibited some fluctuations, the "FPT family" of stocks stood out for their resilience and projected growth, placing FPT as a top-performing private company in Vietnam.

title: Coteccons lãi gần 50% với khoản đầu tư vào cổ phiếu FPT, dự phòng toàn bộ khoản phải thu 143 tỷ với Saigon Glory
summary: Coteccons, a construction company, reported strong Q2 2024 financial results, with a significant increase in profit. However, the company faces substantial short-term and long-term debts, including a considerable portion of outstanding receivables (12,448 billion VND) and recognized bad debts (1,659 billion VND).  Notable among the bad debts are those owed by Saigon Glory and Ngôi Sao Việt, which are involved in large real estate projects.  While Coteccons' profit increased substantially, this is largely offset by the large amount of debt and provisions for doubtful accounts.  The company also made a profitable investment in FPT stock.

title: Giải pháp Made by FPT IS tạo cú hích trong chuyển đổi xanh
summary: FPT IS presented VertZéro, a solution for companies to manage greenhouse gas emissions, at a conference on developing Vietnam's semiconductor workforce.  VertZéro digitizes emission tracking, calculation, reporting, and reduction targets, enabling companies to comply with international standards (ISO 14064-1, GHG Protocol).  The presentation highlighted the increasing importance of ESG compliance and highlighted FPT IS's role in helping Vietnamese businesses adapt to global sustainability standards.

title: Long Châu lãi to, cổ phiếu FPT Retail lập đỉnh lịch sử mới, vốn hóa chạm ngưỡng 1 tỷ USD
summary: FPT Retail's stock (FRT) hit a new high on August 21, reaching a record valuation near $1 billion USD, primarily due to the strong performance of its pharmacy chain, FPT Long Châu.  Long Châu's revenue surged 67% year-over-year in the first half of 2024, becoming a significant contributor to FPT Retail's overall financial success.  Analysts predict continued growth for both Long Châu and FPT Retail, driven by factors including the growing demand for healthcare services, particularly vaccinations and pharmaceuticals, and Long Châu's aggressive expansion strategy.  While the broader retail sector faces challenges, the healthcare segment is showing resilience, potentially driving long-term growth for FPT Retail.

title: Ông Trương Gia Bình: "FPT tiết kiệm từng xu từng hào, nhưng chúng ta đã cá cược lớn đến thế, vì chúng ta tin tưởng vào AI!"
summary: FPT Chairman Trương Gia Bình declared a strong commitment to AI, stating that the company will "bet everything on AI" for future success.  This aggressive strategy involves significant investment, including a US$200 million AI Factory in Vietnam,  global partnerships with leading AI companies like NVIDIA, and a goal of training one million AI specialists by 2035.  The company is integrating AI into all its products and services, and emphasizing the need for employees to develop AI expertise to increase productivity.  This bold stance reflects FPT's recognition of AI's transformative potential and its position as a key technology for future growth and competitiveness.

title: Cách FPT Software áp dụng bài học từ huyền thoại công nghệ thế giới
summary: FPT Software's success is built on a culture of continuous learning and adaptation, drawing lessons from global tech leaders like Infosys.  The company has invested heavily in training programs, including language acquisition (Japanese), specialized certifications, and cutting-edge technologies like AI and cloud computing.  FPT Software's strategy involves upskilling its workforce to meet the demands of international clients and industries, leveraging a combination of on-shore, near-shore, and off-shore resources.  This commitment to ongoing training and adapting to new technologies is critical to FPT Software's global ambitions and competitiveness in the technology sector.

title: "Hoa hậu FPT 2018": ‘1/2 traffic vào website Long Châu đọc tin tức chứ không phải mua hàng, nên nếu bắt đầu xây nền tảng để bán hàng thì sai rồi’
summary: FPT Long Châu's CEO, Nguyễn Đỗ Quyên, emphasizes the crucial role of technology in improving healthcare services, particularly for managing chronic conditions.  While acknowledging the importance of technology, she stresses that its implementation must prioritize patient safety and address real needs, not just be a sales tool.  She highlights the success of using technology for patient engagement (e.g., personalized training programs for pharmacists, automated medication reminders via AI, and integrated vaccination records), as well as for operational efficiency, streamlining processes from inventory to customer service.  The focus is on proactive health management and using technology to enhance the user experience, rather than solely focusing on increasing sales.

title: Ông Hoàng Nam Tiến: “Tôi có đủ gạch đá xây 3 tòa nhà FPT chỉ vì phát biểu cần làm việc 12 – 14 tiếng/ngày”
summary: FPT executive Hoàng Nam Tiến discussed the demanding nature of leadership in a fast-paced, ambitious environment.  He argued that while leaders may face criticism for long working hours (e.g., 12-14 hours a day),  the dedication required to achieve significant results, especially in a developing country with limited resources, often necessitates a similar level of commitment.  He noted that while balance is essential, the need to compete and innovate globally sometimes necessitates prioritization of work. He used Elon Musk as an example of a leader who demands high productivity from their teams, suggesting that such intense work habits are often unavoidable for leaders seeking to create groundbreaking innovation.  The discussion also touches on the trade-offs between work and personal life for leaders and underscores the unique context of Vietnam's development.

title: Hậu trường M&A DN Nhật đầu tiên của FPT: 6 năm mới chốt được deal, bởi người Nhật không bán vì tiền, mà muốn tìm bạn hiền gửi 'con'
summary: FPT Software's acquisition of Japanese IT services company NAC took six years of negotiation.  The key to the deal wasn't solely financial gain, but rather a cultural trust factor.  Japanese companies, in this case, prioritize finding a reliable partner to entrust their company's future to.  FPT's long-term presence in Japan, strong leadership, and consistent growth played a significant role in securing this important partnership. The acquisition boosts FPT's client base and service portfolio in the Japanese market, a key area for their global ambitions.

title: VNDirect: FPT hoãn ra mắt Dự án Trung tâm dữ liệu lớn nhất Việt Nam
summary: FPT's planned massive data center in Ho Chi Minh City's District 9 has been delayed until 2025.  Originally slated for Q3 2024, the delay is attributed to unspecified factors, but analysts anticipate continued strong growth in the data center sector, largely driven by increasing AI adoption and data security regulations.  While the delay is a setback,  FPT's existing data centers and projected future revenue growth remain positive indicators.

title: FPT Sendo Farm ký kết hợp tác thành công cùng Siba Food và Chợ Tốt
summary: FPT's Sendo Farm, an online marketplace, partnered with Siba Food (a producer of plant-based meats) and Chợ Tốt (a Vietnamese online marketplace).  Sendo Farm will handle the distribution of Siba Food products, focusing on quality and affordability.  The partnership with Chợ Tốt expands Sendo Farm's reach and workforce, enabling flexible work opportunities.  The overall strategy appears to be expanding Sendo Farm's offerings beyond just ICT products, targeting a wider range of consumer needs and potentially new markets.

title: Tổng Giám đốc FPT Software được bổ nhiệm làm Phó Tổng Giám đốc Tập đoàn FPT
summary: FPT appointed Phạm Minh Tuấn as its new Deputy CEO, effective March 13, 2024.  Tuấn will continue his role as CEO of FPT Software.  This move is part of FPT's leadership reshuffle, focusing on global expansion and key technology areas like cloud computing, AI, semiconductors, automotive technology, and digital transformation.  Tuấn's previous experience, including roles at FPT Software and other FPT subsidiaries, underscores his deep understanding of the company's operations and strategic direction.  The appointment also signifies FPT's commitment to continuous growth and development in a rapidly evolving technology landscape.

title: Khai phá tiềm năng AI trong ngành logistic: FPT đồng hành cùng Headway Holding
summary: FPT Digital, a subsidiary of FPT, partnered with Headway Holding to introduce AI solutions in the logistics industry.  The collaboration focused on training Headway's staff on AI applications, demonstrating practical use cases and outlining a digital transformation roadmap.  FPT Digital's expertise in AI implementation, combined with Headway's logistics operations, is intended to optimize processes, improve efficiency (potentially reducing costs by 30%), and enhance customer satisfaction.  The aim is to help logistics companies effectively integrate AI into existing systems and processes, a necessary step in the digitalization of the industry.

title: Công ty nhà người ta: FPT cho cán bộ nhân viên vay mua nhà, tậu xe lãi suất thấp, ESOP hàng năm
summary: FPT is continuing its employee benefits program, offering low-interest loans for home and car purchases, as well as an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).  This is part of a broader strategy to retain talent, especially high-performing employees.  FPT Telecom has a specific program for loan interest support, while FPT Retail has a similar initiative.  The company also maintains a consistent policy of distributing dividends, with a projected 35% payout in 2023, combining cash and stock dividends. These benefits are presented as key retention strategies, positioning FPT as a desirable employer in Vietnam's competitive market.

title: Ông Đỗ Cao Bảo: Bỏ ngoài tai những lời chê bai “nổ”, “chém gió”, lãnh đạo FPT xuất hiện trên đài truyền hình Nhật Bản
summary: FPT Chairman Trương Gia Bình's visit to NHK (a major Japanese TV network) and meetings with top international tech leaders, according to Đỗ Cao Bảo, demonstrate FPT's serious commitment to AI, semiconductors, and other cutting-edge technologies.  Bảo argues that despite criticism of perceived "exaggeration" in FPT's pronouncements, Bình's actions and investments (e.g., the US$200 million AI Factory) demonstrate a genuine belief in the potential of these technologies and a proactive approach to securing global partnerships.  The article highlights FPT's ambition to establish itself as a major player in the global AI landscape, not just through financial investment but also through strategic partnerships and talent acquisition.

title: Cổ phiếu FPT Retail (FRT) lập đỉnh giá mới
summary: FPT Retail's stock (FRT) reached a new all-time high of 188,000 VND per share on August 21, 2024, pushing its market capitalization above 25,600 billion VND (~$1 billion USD).  This surge is attributed to strong financial results for the first half of 2024, particularly the robust performance of the FPT Long Châu pharmacy segment, which accounts for a significant portion of FPT Retail's revenue and profit.  Positive macroeconomic indicators, including strong retail sales figures for July, are also contributing to investor confidence.  While FPT's other stock (FPT) also saw a gain, it did not reach its prior high.  Foreign institutional investors saw a shift in their trading activity, moving from net selling to net buying FPT shares in the same period.

title: FPT Retail (FRT) đạt 161 tỷ đồng lãi trước thuế sau 6 tháng, vượt 28% kế hoạch cả năm
summary: FPT Retail (FRT) saw strong first-half 2024 financial results, with revenue up 22% and profit before tax exceeding projections by 28%, reaching 161 billion VND.  The pharmacy chain, FPT Long Châu, was a major driver of this success, generating 63% of total revenue.  While FPT Shop saw a slight decline in revenue compared to Q1 2024, the company attributes this to a planned optimization of its store network, closing underperforming stores.  The report highlights significant expansion in the pharmacy and vaccination segments, indicating a strong focus on the healthcare sector.

title: FPT rót thêm 800 tỷ đồng vào công ty con chuyên về AI và điện toán đám mây
summary: FPT increased its investment in FPT Smart Cloud, a subsidiary focused on AI and cloud computing services, by 800 billion VND, raising its capital to 1 trillion VND.  This significant capital injection underscores FPT's commitment to expanding its AI capabilities and cloud services, which currently serve over 3,000 clients in 15 countries.  The investment is aligned with FPT's overall growth strategy and strong financial performance in the first nine months of 2024, exceeding targets for revenue and profit.

title: Đại học FPT tuyển 1.000 sinh viên ngành Thiết kế Vi mạch bán dẫn, cấp học bổng từ 50% đến 100%
summary: FPT University is launching a specialized Semiconductor Chip Design program, offering 1,000 scholarships, potentially covering 50% or 100% of tuition costs for the first two semesters.  This program aims to train a significant number of students for the global semiconductor market, with potential collaborations with US and Taiwanese universities to ensure high quality training and experience.  A key aspect of the program is facilitating international internships and job placements with FPT companies worldwide, particularly in high-demand semiconductor hubs.

title: FPT Software hợp tác với GigaX thúc đẩy chuyển đổi số và phát triển bền vững tại châu Âu
summary: FPT Software partnered with GigaX, a Korean tech firm, to expand their European market presence and develop solutions for managing carbon emissions in industries like automotive, semiconductors, and energy.  The collaboration aims to leverage FPT Software's existing European network and GigaX's expertise in carbon emission management technology, particularly using digital tools like AI, digital twins, and edge computing.  The partnership targets a significant market in carbon-conscious European industries, aligning with broader global sustainability goals.

title: Tổng công ty Điện lực - TKV khởi động dự án Tư vấn chuyển đổi số cùng FPT
summary: FPT Digital is advising state-owned power company TKV on a digital transformation strategy.  The project involves a comprehensive assessment of TKV's current digital maturity across six key areas (customers, strategy, technology, operations, culture, and data), followed by the development of a tailored digital transformation roadmap.  FPT Digital will provide solutions to optimize operations, integrate data across departments, and ultimately drive efficiency and sustainability for TKV by 2030.  The initiative reflects TKV's recognition of the need for digital transformation in the energy sector and FPT Digital's expertise in guiding such initiatives.

title: FPT Shop bán điều hoà giá rẻ từ 5 triệu/chiếc, cho trả góp chỉ với 31.000 đồng/ngày
summary: FPT Shop is expanding its product offerings to include air conditioners, starting April 1, 2024.  The company is targeting the market with competitive pricing, starting at over 5 million VND, and offering bundled deals like installation, warranty, and financing options (0% interest, 31,000 VND daily payments).  This move into the appliance market is seen as a diversification strategy, given the current challenges in the ICT sector. FPT Shop's financial projections for 2024 suggest a flat revenue outlook for its ICT segment. However, the company's pharmacy division, FPT Long Châu, is expected to continue strong growth,  a key factor for the overall success of FPT Retail.

title: Điểm chung đáng kinh ngạc của Nvidia và FPT
summary: FPT and Nvidia share a remarkable pattern of consistent, high growth in the first half of 2024.  Nvidia's strong Q3 earnings, driven by high demand for AI-related chips, mirror the steady financial performance of FPT, which has also experienced impressive revenue and profit growth across its segments, particularly international IT services.  Both companies are heavily invested in AI, with FPT's AI Factory in Japan being a key part of their strategy.  The parallel growth trajectories highlight the booming global AI market and the potential of Vietnamese tech companies, like FPT, to benefit from this trend.

title: Chứng khoán FPT muốn vay 1.000 tỷ đồng từ ACB
summary: FPT Securities (FPTS) is seeking a 1 trillion VND loan from ACB, a Vietnamese bank.  The loan, secured by assets including FPT's deposits at ACB and government bonds, will be used for operational expenses, government bond investments, and margin lending activities.  However, FPTS was also penalized by the Vietnamese Securities Commission (UBCKNN) for not meeting staffing requirements and failing to report certain financial activities. The total fine was 177.5 million VND.

title: Vụ ‘giảng viên đầu tiên ở VN bị mất việc bởi AI’: FPT Polytechnic thừa nhận nóng vội, giảng viên sẽ trở lại trường sau 7 ngày cho thôi việc
summary: A FPT Polytechnic lecturer was initially dismissed for allegedly criticizing a student for using AI to complete an assignment.  Following public backlash and family concerns, the school reversed the decision seven days later, recognizing their initial handling was flawed.  The lecturer will return to teaching, and the school pledged to work with the student and family to address the situation.  The incident highlighted a misstep in the school's handling of the case, resulting in a public apology from FPT Polytechnic.

title: Dự án 4.362 tỷ đồng mà FPT muốn biến Bình Định trở thành trung tâm AI của khu vực có gì hay?
summary: FPT is investing in a large-scale AI center (AI Factory) in Quy Nhơn, Bình Định, aiming to make the province a regional AI hub.  The 93.24-hectare project, costing 4.362 billion VND, will include an AI research and development center, an education complex (from primary to university level), and associated urban amenities.  FPT's vision is to foster a strong local AI talent pool, attract global AI specialists, and leverage its existing technology partnerships to secure significant international projects. This initiative builds on FPT's existing presence and investment in Bình Định, including prior digital transformation agreements.

title: Giá trị các công ty công nghệ Việt Nam 'đua nhau' lập đỉnh mới: Có doanh nghiệp sắp chạm ngưỡng 10 tỷ USD, vốn hóa FPT cũng tăng gần 2 tỷ USD từ đầu năm
summary: Several Vietnamese tech stocks, notably those associated with FPT, reached new highs on May 15, 2024.  FPT's stock price and market cap surged, surpassing Techcombank in value.  This strong performance is linked to positive financial results, particularly in the international IT services sector, fueled by increasing global demand for technology solutions and FPT's strategic partnerships and investments.  The positive performance of FPT and related companies reflects a broader bullish sentiment toward the Vietnamese tech sector, potentially driven by global tech trends like AI and semiconductors, as well as government support for technology development.

title: "FPT từng kinh doanh rất nhiều mảng, nếu bỏ hết đi chỉ giữ lại một, thì giữ lại thứ gì?": Ông Hoàng Nam Tiến đưa ra câu trả lời bất ngờ
summary: In a podcast interview, FPT's Hoàng Nam Tiến discussed key lessons learned during his 30+ years with the company.  He highlighted FPT's commitment to education as a core value, emphasizing the need to constantly innovate and adapt.  Tiến stressed the importance of a proactive, ambitious mindset ("we have to do things that go beyond the norm"), a strong sense of collective purpose ("we have to mobilize the power of the whole nation"), and the necessity of relentless learning to stay ahead in the evolving tech landscape.  He used FPT's success in technology as a backdrop to underscore the importance of these principles.

title: Thông tin mới vụ cháy FPT Shop ở quận Gò Vấp
summary: A fire broke out at an FPT Shop in Gò Vấp district, Ho Chi Minh City, on April 29th.  The fire, originating in the store's backroom,  damaged approximately 80 square meters of merchandise, including electronics and accessories.  Three fire trucks and fifteen firefighters were dispatched to the scene to extinguish the blaze.  The fire was contained quickly.  Three employees were in the store at the time of the fire and escaped safely.  Local residents initially reported the smoke, alerting the staff.

title: Chủ tịch FPT Trương Gia Bình sẽ tham gia bộ phim của Warner Bros. Discovery về hành trình cách mạng công nghệ Việt Nam
summary: FPT, a leading Vietnamese tech company, is collaborating with Warner Bros. Discovery to produce a 30-minute documentary, "Silicon Delta – The story of Vietnam's Tech Revolution."  The film will chronicle Vietnam's remarkable tech transformation, featuring FPT as a key protagonist, including interviews with Trương Gia Bình, Chu Thị Thanh Hà, and other top FPT executives.  The documentary will highlight FPT's early struggles and its pioneering spirit, including its "export or die" mentality.  The film is set to premiere on Discovery Channel in Asia-Pacific, Japan, and Germany in September.

title: Chủ tịch Trương Gia Bình: “Mặt trời mọc ở đâu, FPT ở đó"
summary: FPT Chairman Trương Gia Bình, in the 2023 annual report, highlighted the company's strong financial performance, driven by significant growth in its international IT services segment.  He emphasized FPT's global ambition, aiming for $5 billion in overseas revenue by 2030 and a one million-employee milestone by 2035.  Key focus areas include AI, semiconductors, automotive technology, and digital transformation, reflecting FPT's strategic investments and a proactive approach to global competition, along with a strong focus on employee retention and a commitment to helping Vietnam become a global technology hub.

title: Nikkei: Cơn sốt AI do Nvidia dẫn đầu khiến cổ phiếu công nghệ ở Việt Nam và một nước láng giềng tăng vọt, FPT thậm chí còn lập đỉnh lịch sử
summary: Nvidia's strong AI-related Q3 earnings and subsequent partnerships with Vietnamese and Malaysian tech firms (FPT and YTL Power International) are driving significant stock price increases.  The gains reflect investor confidence in the long-term potential of AI and semiconductors, with Vietnam and Malaysia potentially benefiting from a shift in global supply chains.  While some newer tech startups are struggling, established companies like FPT and YTL are seeing substantial stock price appreciation and are positioned to benefit from the current global AI boom, particularly in cloud computing and data services.

title: Mẹ cựu lãnh đạo Chứng khoán FPT chốt lời đúng đỉnh hàng triệu cổ phiếu FTS
summary: A large group of FPT Securities (FPTS) shareholders, including the mother of a former board member, sold 3 million shares in the company.  The sale, estimated to generate around 190 billion VND, took place over two days (March 13th and 15th, 2024).  While FTS stock price had reached a recent high, the sale suggests a strategic decision by the shareholders to adjust their holdings.  The article also details FPTS's expected 2024 financial plans, including lower projected revenue and profit compared to 2023, as well as a proposed capital increase through a share issuance.

title: Long Châu thưởng lớn: Bảo vệ thưởng hệ số 100%, các vị trí khác nhận 120% nhờ doanh thu vượt 1.900 tỷ so với kế hoạch, vượt trên FPT Shop
summary: FPT Long Châu, the pharmacy chain within FPT Retail, saw significant revenue growth (around 60%) in Q4 2023, exceeding FPT Shop's revenue and becoming a key driver for the overall company's performance.  This success led to substantial bonuses for Long Châu employees, with particularly high bonuses for staff in roles like security and inventory management.  The strong performance is attributed to increased store openings, a diversified product portfolio, and competitive pricing, which have allowed Long Châu to capture market share from traditional pharmacies and even modern retail chains.
